item.title: No-Dig Garden Beds Australia: The Complete Guide to Building and Growing
item.description: No-dig gardening has become one of the most popular ways to grow food in Australia â€” and for good reason. It works on terrible soil, it’s easier on your body, it builds soil health over time, and you can set one up in a single weekend. Whether you’re in a suburban backyard or on acreage, a no-dig bed is the fastest way to go from bare ground to fresh produce.
